Title: Justice Is Done
Writer: André Cayatte (screenplay), Charles Spaak (dialogue), Charles Spaak (screenplay)
Actors: Michel Auclair, Antoine Balpêtré, Raymond Bussières, Jacques Castelot
Plot: Known as "Justice Is Done" in 1953 when it was first shown in the USA, it opens with a short briefing in English on the French jury system and then reverts to French with English subtitles....
